channel.title: Comments on: Ariadne, the Cretan Princess
channel.description: Stellar Short Fiction by Women-Identified Writers Since 2010

item.title: By: suzmuse
item.dc:creator: suzmuse
item.description: Oh, thank you!! I love that the name Ariadne was under consideration for one of your girls.
item.content:encoded: Oh, thank you!! I love that the name Ariadne was under consideration for one of your girls.

item.title: By: giantsdancefarm
item.dc:creator: giantsdancefarm
item.description:
Thank you for sharing that Suz. As usual, I found your writing both wonderfully enlightening and completely entertaining.
I do remember reading quite a bit about Ariadne almost exactly 30 years ago as Ariadne was one of the names I considered for my at the time, brand new TB mare. Her registered name was "Dancing Din" and her barn name "Moose". I narrowed it down to Ariadne and Daphne, but just before choosing one of those she told me she didn't like those "girly" names and wanted to be called "Devon".
item.content:encoded:
Thank you for sharing that Suz. As usual, I found your writing both wonderfully enlightening and completely entertaining.

I do remember reading quite a bit about Ariadne almost exactly 30 years ago as Ariadne was one of the names I considered for my at the time, brand new TB mare. Her registered name was “Dancing Din” and her barn name “Moose”. I narrowed it down to Ariadne and Daphne, but just before choosing one of those she told me she didn’t like those “girly” names and wanted to be called “Devon”.
